episodes.title: Tractoring
episodes.description: Jeremy Clarkson embarks on his path towards muddy misery and potential ruin by running his own farm.

episodes.title: Sheeping
episodes.description: Jeremy decides to get a flock of sheep, not realising the added complications these high-maintenance animals will bring.

episodes.title: Shopping
episodes.description: Jeremy Clarkson decides to open a farm shop to sell his own produce. This sounds like it should be easy. It isn’t.

episodes.title: Wilding
episodes.description: Jeremy Clarkson decides to become a naturalist.

episodes.title: Pan (dem) icking
episodes.description: As Covid-19 puts Britain on lockdown, Jeremy suddenly finds that his biggest worries aren’t all related to the upcoming lambing season.

episodes.title: Melting
episodes.description: Jeremy discovers why British farmers are always complaining about the weather. It’s mostly because it never does what they want it to do.

episodes.title: Fluffing
episodes.description: As the drought drags on and harvest time gets closer, Jeremy and his motley crew have a fearsome list of jobs to complete.

episodes.title: Harvesting
episodes.description: After months of hard work Clarkson's farm arrives at a make or break moment; harvest time.

episodes.title: Surviving
episodes.description: Jeremy Clarkson sets out to diversify, as a way of increasing his annual profit (£144 last year).

episodes.title: Cowering
episodes.description: Jeremy's new herd of cows settle in, but soon reject the fence that keeps them in.

episodes.title: Schmoozing
episodes.description: Faced with Council powers that be, Jeremy uses two of his greatest skills: diplomacy and respect for red tape.

episodes.title: Badgering
episodes.description: Jeremy Clarkson comes face to face with his nemesis: the badger.

episodes.title: Council-ing
episodes.description: The day of the Council's decision on Jeremy's restaurant arrives.

episodes.title: Counselling
episodes.description: The fall-out from the Council's decision continues to fall out.

episodes.title: Scheming
episodes.description: Jeremy's restaurant idea is re-born, and there's not a moment to waste.

episodes.title: Climaxing
episodes.description: Secret preparations accelerate for the opening of Jeremy's restaurant.
